title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 6.1 - 14/01/2016
body: On 14/01/2016, starting at 04:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.1. At 06:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

replies.body: So when does the ranked start where we can do our promos?
Let's get ready to grind ladies and gents!{{item:3009}}
=/ Still have a bit to wait
